it.uiip.digitalgarage.roboadvice.persistence.repository

Interface CapitalRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<CapitalEntity,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<CapitalEntity,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<CapitalEntity,java.lang.Long>

    @Repository
 @Transactional
public interface CapitalRepository
extends org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<CapitalEntity,java.lang.Long>
    This interface offers methods to retrieve data from the capital table in the database.
    Author:
    Cristian Laurini, Luca Antilici

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<CapitalEntity> findByUser(UserEntity user)
      This method allows to retrieve all the capitals for the selected user.
      CapitalEntity findByUserAndDate(UserEntity user, java.time.LocalDate date)
      This method allows to retrieve the capital for the selected user in a specific date.
      java.util.List<CapitalEntity> findByUserAndDateBetween(UserEntity user, java.time.LocalDate finalDate, java.time.LocalDate initialDate)
      This method allows to retrieve all the capitals for the selected user in a specific period of time between initialDate and finalDate.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository

        findAll, findAll

      • Methods inherited from interface org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository

        count, delete, delete, delete, deleteAll, exists, findAll, findAll, findOne, save, save

    • Method Detail

      • findByUser

        java.util.List<CapitalEntity> findByUser(UserEntity user)
        This method allows to retrieve all the capitals for the selected user.
        Parameters:
        user - UserEntity is the user for which you want to retrieve the capitals.
        Returns:
        List of CapitalEntities.

      • findByUserAndDate

        CapitalEntity findByUserAndDate(UserEntity user,
                                java.time.LocalDate date)
        This method allows to retrieve the capital for the selected user in a specific date.
        Parameters:
        user - UserEntity is the user for which you want to retrieve the capital.
        date - LocalDate is the date for which you want to retrieve the capital.
        Returns:
        CapitalEntity.

      • findByUserAndDateBetween

        java.util.List<CapitalEntity> findByUserAndDateBetween(UserEntity user,
                                                       java.time.LocalDate finalDate,
                                                       java.time.LocalDate initialDate)
        This method allows to retrieve all the capitals for the selected user in a specific period of time between initialDate and finalDate.
        Parameters:
        user - UserEntity is the user for which you want to retrieve the capitals.
        finalDate - LocalDate is the last date of the period for which you want to retrieve the capitals.
        initialDate - LocalDate is the starting date of the period for which you want to retrieve the capitals.
        Returns:
        List of CapitalEntities.
